features: Marmot M3 Softshell fabric is highly breathable and offers intense comfort and water repellency for mild, dry climates with very high aerobic activity
Articulated knees for improved mobility; Gusseted inseam
Adjustable waist with snap closure and zip fly; Adjustable drawcord leg hems
Zippered hand pockets; Zippered thigh pocket
Main materials: Softshell Double Weave 56% Nylon, 34% Polyester, 10% Elastane 6.5 oz/yd
